name: FFXIV TOP - P3 Monitor Training Sim
name_original: FFXIV TOP - P3 Monitor Training Sim
description:
FFXIV TOP - P3 Monitor Training Sim

A small simulator for the monitor mechanic in FFXIV The Omega Protocol Ultimate, Phase 3

This tool still needs some tweaking, especially on the character controls.

You can choose your role and your participation in the mechanic via a settings panel.

Strat used : https://ff14.toolboxgaming.space/?id=073180945764761&preview=1
Might add other strats if needed.
